headline: Kimco Realty Corporation Announces 2024 Dividend Tax Treatment for RPT Realty Convertible Preferred Investors
summary: JERICHO, N.Y., Jan. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kimco Realty® (NYSE: KIM) a real estate investment trust (REIT) and leading owner and operator of high-quality, open-air, grocery-anchored shopping centers and mixed-use properties in the United States, announced today the 2024 tax treatment of RPT Realty Series D Cumulative Convertible Preferred investor’s dividend distributions.
